name: Slime Escape (itch) (namak)
description:
~ A 2d pixel-art platformer game. ~

"Slimy is a slime that lives in a dungeon. One day, he decided to escape to see the world outside. With the lucky top hat that grants him the sticky power, Slimy is determined to change his life."

3 Melbourne musketeers got together after the IGDA's April meeting to make this game. Hope you had fun, I know we did!

Nam (namdk131#1459) - Programming & Art

Wesley (KwaiLotus#3121) - Design

Jake (berry#4341) - Programming, Sound, Art, Animation
